--- alter_table_alter_column.sql
alter table foo alter column foo string(256) not null
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AlterColumn{
    Alter: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 29,
      NameEnd: 32,
      Name: "foo",
    },
    Alteration: &ast.AlterColumnType{
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 33,
        Rparen: 43,
        Name: "STRING",
        Size: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 40,
          ValueEnd: 43,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "256",
        },
      },
      Null: 49,
      NotNull: true,
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ALTER COLUMN foo STRING(256) NOT NULL
